text: mariyu atu vaipunaku oka batasarula brndam vaccindi. Varu tama niru tecce manisini pamparu, atadu (bavilo) bokkenanu dimpadu. (Ataniki bavilo oka baludu kanipincaga) annadu: "Idigo subhavarta! Ikkada oka baludunnadu." Varu atanini oka vyapara sarukuga (banisaga) bhavinci dacukunnaru. Mariyu varu cestunnadanta allah ku baga telusu
